text.quote: 000: Clause 5, page 3, line 28, at end insert—

“( ) For the avoidance of doubt, where no direct heirs to a hereditary peerage or baronetcy exist, succession shall continue according to the limitation or destination, but with the succession being traced without reference to gender.”
